articles.content: Elected officials across the US are moving to end enhanced federal unemployment compensation arguing that its disincentivizing people from looking for work. Those benefits have already ended in 22 st… [+4706 chars]

articles.title: With pools at capacity, here's a list of Portland fountains and splash pads - KATU
articles.description: A heatwave is bringing record-setting temperatures to the Pacific Northwest, and the prolonged heat could be dangerous for some. Health officials are asking people to stay hydrated, limit time in the sun, get in an air-conditioned space when they can, and che…

articles.title: Beachbody is going public, and CEO says the stock is like a bargain-priced Peloton - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Fitness brand The Beachbody Company (NYSE:BODY) begins trading Monday, and CEO Carl Daikeler sees the stock as both the ‘Disney+ of Fitness’ and a Peloton-like play at a bargain price.
